subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, the No. 1 seed, beat Feliciano López, 6-1, 7-5, in an all-Spanish semifinal to advance at the Mercedes Cup in Stuttgart, Germany.Nadal will face Stanislas Wawrinka, who upset the seventh-seeded Juan Ignacio Chela, 6-7 (2), 6-4, 6-1.López almost took the second set, but Nadal held on; he has not lost a set in this tournament. He has won 92 of his past 93 matches on clay.“To lose always hurts, but when you know you lost to the best player on clay and one of your closest friends, it is a little easier,” López said.
